tool_description: Retrieve Filing , Company, Issuer, Insider Information from the SEC EDGAR System.
name: SEC EDGAR
title: SEC EDGAR

api_list.name: Get Company Facts
api_list.description: Get Complete Company Financial Statements Data

api_list.name: Get Specific Month Filings
Get Latest Filings - Latest 200
api_list.description: Get Latest 200 Filings as soon as they are available on the SEC EDGAR System.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sec-edgar.p.rapidapi.com/Filing/GetLatestFilings"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sec-edgar.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Filings
api_list.description: Get List of Company, Institutional Owners, Company Insider Filings.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This id is the Company's SEC EDGAR CIK Code.

optional_parameters.name: fromdate
optional_parameters.description:
Please note the Date Format: YYYY-MM-DD. 

Default date is Beginning of the Year, if no date is provided.

optional_parameters.name: todate
optional_parameters.description:
Please note the Date Format: YYYY-MM-DD. 

Default date is Previous Month End, if no date is provided.

optional_parameters.name: code
optional_parameters.description:
This code is the Filing Code from the SEC EDGAR System.

Default value is 10-K, 10-K/A, if no value is provided. 

Multiple filing codes are allowed. Multiple codes to be comma delimited.

api_list.name: Get SEC EDGAR CIK Code List
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to obtain list of Tickers and SEC EDGAR CIK Codes for Entities and Individuals. This makes it much more easier to allow you to obtain SEC EDGAR CIK Codes needed to retrieve filings.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sec-edgar.p.rapidapi.com/Company/GetTickers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sec-edgar.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Specific Day Filings
api_list.description: Get Specific Day Filings - Within Last 5 Business Days

api_list.name: Get Balance Sheet, Income Statement, Cash Flow Statement and Other Financial Statement Data
api_list.description: Get Company's most recent Balance Sheet, Income Statement, Cash Flow Statement and other Financial Statement data.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This id is the Company's SEC EDGAR CIK Code.

required_parameters.name: code
required_parameters.description:
This code is the Filing Code from the SEC EDGAR System.

Default value is 10-K, 10-K/A, if no value is provided. 

Multiple filing codes are allowed. Multiple codes to be comma delimited.

optional_parameters.name: todate
optional_parameters.description:
Please note the Date Format: YYYY-MM-DD. 

Default date is Previous Month End, if no date is provided.

optional_parameters.name: fromdate
optional_parameters.description:
Please note the Date Format: YYYY-MM-DD. 

Default date is Beginning of the Year, if no date is provided.

api_list.name: Get Company Insiders Filings
api_list.description:
Get List of Company Insiders so you are able to much easily obtain their filings using the SEC EDGAR CIK Codes. 

Company Insiders filings gives special insights to the transactions of Company Insiders like the CEO, CFO and other C-Suite Executives.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This id parameter is the Company's CIK Code.

api_list.name: Get Company Institutional Owners Filings
api_list.description:
Get List of Institutional Owners so you are able to much easily obtain their filings using the SEC EDGAR CIK Codes. 

Institutional Owners filings gives special insights to the transactions of Institutional Owners.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This id parameter is the Company's CIK Code.
